DOC.brief_summary: The purpose cluster randomise trial investigate whether Yhteispeli whole school programme effective improve child 's socio-emotional skill mental health socio-emotional skill . All Finnish elementary school class 1-3 grade invite participate study . The school randomly allocate receive either Yhteispeli programme two lecture
DOC.brief_title: Yhteispeli - Effectiveness Study Promoting Childrens ' Socio-emotional Skills School
